comments.content: A manually compressed **[Flamenco](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803141720/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=URW&ffam=FlamencoD%20-%20Regular&fid=83bc61b65cb49da330316ff2bbfad9df&fsize=60&text=BOHEMER%20TRANSPORTATION%20CORP.&wrap=2)**, available by Letraset, URW++, ITC

Terrible torture of a good font (:  
Don
